page.title: 22Tadcaster Carnival
page.content:
How well I remember decorating the Ugly Bug Ball lorry, lent by Bass Brewing. Due to fading interest and Health&Safety regulations the Carnival expired. It is proposed to revive it as a one-off next year (2012) as part of the town's Jubilee celebrations. Perhaps we live in a safer world but it sure is duller sometimes.
Contribution by: Peter Bradshaw
